name: The Emperor's Prize
Lore: 'Vader thought that by capturing Luke, he would crush the Alliance''s last hope. But, there was another...',
Text: 'If Luke was just ''frozen,'' deploy on Emperor or Detention Block Corridor. Target Luke and Vader. When reached by targets, place Utinni Effect on Luke and opponent must lose half of Life Force (round down). If Luke released, lose Utinni Effect. (Immune to Alter.)',
